extensionDescription.message: Enables you to classify opened tabs freely and switch tab easily by tab lists displayed on a board.

configResetConfirm.message:
All information about tab lists will be deleted.
Opened tabs won't be closed.

sidebarErrorMain.message: A tab list which contains the current tab will be displayed here.

sidebarErrorNoinfo.message: Tab list is not available. Please open the Tab List Board first, then try again.
